did.unittitle: Josef Gugler African and Middle Eastern Film Collection. Series 3. Small Format Publicity Materials
did.abstract: The Josef Gugler collection consists of promotional materials for films produced in or directed by filmmakers from Africa and the Middle East. Over 500 unique films by approximately 350 film directors are represented. Formats include film posters, pressbooks, chirashi flyers, lobby and storefront cards, handbills, photographs, slides, and audiovisual recordings.
did.langmaterial: Materials are in multiple languages, predominantly French, English, and German, but also Arabic, Hebrew, Japanese, and various other European and Asian languages.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The materials in this collection are open to the public.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following three series:

list.item: * Subseries 3.5. Lobby cards, store front cards, and oversized publicity photos, 1966-2010

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Josef Gugler collection consists of promotional materials for films produced in or directed by filmmakers from Africa and the Middle East. Over 500 unique films by approximately film directors are represented. Small promotional formats include pressbooks, chirashi flyers, lobby and storefront cards, handbills, photographs, slides, and a few miscellaneous items. The majority of items in this series are in French, English, and German, although a number of other European and Asian languages are represented.

The photographic materials include 41 prints of African filmmakers Moussa Sene Absa, Flora Gomes, Dani Koyaté, Sarah Maldoror, Isrissa Ouédraogo, Ousmane Sembéne, Ingrid Sinclair, and Cheik Oumar Sissoko. These mostly appear to be candid shots and include photos of Sissoko and Ouédraogo receiving awards for their films at FESPACO. The remaining items are prints and slides of film and production stills for approximately sixty different films.
A description of the full scope and content of the collection and Gugler's biography are available on the main collection finding aid at: http://purl.dlib.indiana.edu/iudl/findingaids/bfca/VAD5484.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The material in this collection was donated by Josef Gugler to the Indiana University Black Film Center Archives in summer 2015.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Materials may be used in-house at the BFC/A; duplication permitted only with permission of the Archivist. Use of audiovisual materials may require the creation of a reference copy. If you wish to preview a VHS recording in this collection, please contact the BFC/A staff well in advance of your visit.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [item], Josef Gugler Collection, Special Collection COL 12, Black Film Center/Archive, Indiana University, Bloomington.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Items in this series are arranged by the title as it appears on the item. If a translation of the title also appears on the item, this is supplied following an equal sign (=). When known and different from what appears on the item itself, the original release title and English release title have been supplied in square brackets for search purposes.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Items in this series are somewhere between a publicity photo and a lobby card. With a few exceptions, they are mostly printed on high-quality poster stock, have overlaid titles like lobby cards, and are roughly 9 x 12 inches. The date enclosed in parantheses is the earliest known release date of the film followed by the copyright or publication date of the item when known.
